select di.id, di.code, di.name, di.content, di.create_date, di.create_by, di.del_flag, ei.name as enterpriseName, ei.images as enterpriseImages from position_info di left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = di.enterprise_id) where 1 = 1 and del_flag = '0'
AND di.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{positionInfo.code},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{positionInfo.name},'%')
AND ei.user_id = #{positionInfo.enterpriseId}
order by create_date desc
